short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immersive multilingual subtitles for online videos, such as Disney, Netflix, YouTube and many more!

long.ar,de,es,fr,ms,ru,vi:
SubtitleX assists in enjoying online videos by loading subtitle files from local files or the SubtitleX database.

😀 Supported subtitle file format: .srt, .sub, .txt 
😀 Unlimited loading subtitle file from local for all user
😀 Over 30,000 videos' subtitles collected
😀 Disney, Netflix, Youtube and many more are supported 
😀 Styling adjustment 
😀 UI with English, Chinese and Korean
 
🙏Subscription option was provided to maintain the server,  which increasing the 5/hour limit to 100/day subtitles from SubtitleX database.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
SubtitleX assists in enjoying online videos by loading subtitle files from local files or the SubtitleX database.

😀 Supported subtitle file format: .srt, .sub, .txt 
😀 Unlimited loading subtitle file from local for all user
😀 Over 500,000 videos' subtitles collected
😀 Styling adjustment 
😀 UI with multiple languages
 
Update log:
2024-08-21  0.3.0  removed the permission for <all_url>, user active the extension by clicking the action icon when necessary, to improve the pricacy protection and performance of tool. We realigned the function relative to subtitlex.xyz to meet the new authentication method.

2022-06-28  0.2.11  add language support for Korean, Chinese, Arabic, Vietnamese, Malay, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, German, Japanese.
